name: Trash Sweeper
description:
There is over 269,000 tons of trash in the ocean, Team Seas plans to remove 30 mil pounds of it by the end of this year! well this is only a small portion of it, every bit does help. And you can help to do so donate at: https://teamseas.org 1 dollar is 1 pound of trash removed from the ocean. This game was made to spread awareness.

Gameplay:

Collect as much of the floating trash as you can, compete for the highest score amongst you and your friends! Recycle trash to get a score bonus.  But be careful the rocks and land will crash your boat!

Controls:

A and D to steer. Esc to open pause menu

Made in 2 Weeks by: Eternal Hunter - Nathan Tombs.

Programs used

  • Unity  2020.3.22f1 
  • Visual Studio 
  • Krita
  • Blender
